title: Quick Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '500g lean minced beef', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 carrot, peeled and finely chopped', '2 celery sticks, finely chopped', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '400g can chopped tomatoes', '450g jar or carton tomato passata', 'good pinch of dried oregano, or to taste', '400g spaghetti', 'grated Parmesan cheese, to serve']
